comments.body: Quote from: Cryptornd on July 14, 2022, 10:50:40 AM<…>You'll be able to do it soon enough, once you become a Jr. Member. All you are going to need is 2 more activity points, since you already meet the Merit requirement (Jr. Member: >= 30 Activity & >= 1 Merit). Sometimes you can have pending Activity to catch-up on by simply posting, but if the Activity value remains the same, you’d have to wait until the next activity update which will take place on the 27/07/2022 (see this google sheet).Edit: So you did have some pending Activity which you managed to pick-up by posting today, thus reaching the Jr. Member rank that is required to post images.

comments.body: If you have the required activity already, you can use sites like https://imgur.com/https://imgbb.com/uploadBut you are not a junior memeber yet, you have to be a junior member because brand new account and newbie can not post image. You have 5 merits, you only lack activity. For now, you can just post the link, people will click on it to see the image you want to post. Any image you post now that has not appeared, it will appear immediately you become a junior member.
